name: Element Miami Doral
description: A contemporary haven amid Miami's vibrant cityscape, Element Miami Doral enjoys a prime location near popular South Florida attractions. Stylish studios and suites offer fully-equipped kitchens, pillowtop mattresses, work desks, and much more. Our eco-friendly accommodations provide a tranquil retreat, conveniently situated near US Southern Command and Florida International University, and close to the airport. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast, setting the perfect tone for exploration and relaxation. Discover museums and indulge in shopping sprees at Dolphin Mall and International Mall. Miami's beaches beckon, inviting you to bask in the warm embrace of the ocean. Afterward, cool off with a dip in our outdoor pool. At 107 Steak & Bar, savor delectable cuts of prime beef and fusion cuisine. Elevate your events in versatile spaces, perfect for meetings, weddings, and private parties. Experience the best of Miami at Element Miami Doral, your home base for unforgettable adventures.Marriott

name: The Gabriel Miami Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Daily Mandatory Destination Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium internet access: $25 food and beverage credit for use in all hotel outlets: shuttle transfer to the Gabriel South Beach, including beach access and two chairs. Experience the essence of downtown Miami, FL at The Gabriel, Curio Collection by Hilton. Our Biscayne Boulevard hotel puts you in the perfect spot for gorgeous bay views from any of our 85 guest room balconies and the 14th floor pool deck. Kaseya Center, Adrienne Arsht Center, Frost Science Museum, and the Perez Art Museum are less than a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is a short drive to South Beach, Brickell, and the Wynwood Arts and Design district. Conveniently located near Miami International Airport, Port Miami terminal, and public transit, we make getting around a breeze. We also provide valet parking. Sip a signature cocktail from Bella's Bar poolside or try unique cuisine from The Gabriel Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The sophisticated third-floor Library Lounge features refreshments and vibrant books about music, art, film, and culture. Burn calories while gazing out at Biscayne Bay from our 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness facility. We also offer complimentary poolside yoga classes every weekend. All of our guest rooms and suites are spacious and have views through floor-to-ceiling windows and smart tech, including integrated digital media with high-definition sound, internet, and a safe with laptop charging.Hilton

name: Biltmore Hotel
description: Boasting amenities including an 18-hole golf course and a full-service spa, this historic resort in Coral Gables, Florida is just 4 miles from Miami International Airport. Brickell City Center is 6.2 mi away. University of Miami is 1.6 miles away Robes and linens are offered in each room at the Biltmore Hotel. A 65-inch flat-screen TV and telephone are also included. The Biltmore Hotel offers 10 lighted tennis courts, an outdoor 2300 square yard swimming pool with cabanas, and an on-site fitness center. In addition, the hotel offers over 150 acres of lush tropical landscape and spacious meeting and banquet facilities. Guests staying at the Biltmore can enjoy a variety of gourmet dining options, including contemporary French cuisine at Palme d'Or and classic Italian dishes at Fontana. The hotel also offers classic pub fare at the 19th Hole restaurant and a Sunday Champagne Brunch. Shopping and dining at Village of Merrick Park are just 1.8 miles from this hotel. Guests will be 5.1 miles from Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and 3.3 miles from coconut Grove.

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Beach South Beach
description: Discover all you need to energize your Miami Beach adventure or slow to a leisurely pace at Courtyard Miami Beach South Beach. Positioned on vibrant Washington Ave. in the Art Deco District, our hotel immerses you in the heart of Miami Beach's iconic scene. Enjoy contemporary amenities featuring a delectable American eatery, convenient valet parking, complimentary Wi-Fi and a Starbucks® café. Our intimate event venue offers tailored dining choices and advanced AV tools perfect for executive meetings and special gatherings in Miami Beach. Refresh in our rooftop pool or stay fit in our 24/7 fitness center equipped with state-of-the-art cardio machines and free weights. As the day winds down, retire to your pet-friendly hotel suite with separate living and sleeping areas, compact fridges, premium bedding, well-appointed workspaces, flat-screen TVs and chic décor. Whether your visit is for business or leisure, craft a memorable stay at Courtyard Miami Beach South Beach.Marriott

name: Extended Stay America Premier Suites - Miami - Airport - Doral -25th Street
description: This Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral - 25th Street is located in Miami and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Miami is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities as well as upgraded bedding with extra pillows. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. The property offers free onsite parking. An attraction within close proximity to the hotel is the Dolphin Mall.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Miami Doral West Airport
description: Find us less than two miles from MIA Airport – easily accessible with our free shuttle. Dolphin Mall and Miami International Mall can be reached in six minutes by car. Downtown and CityPlace Doral are both within a 10-minute drive. We’re only 1.5 miles to Jackson Memorial. Enjoy free WiFi and a heated outdoor pool at our pet friendly hotel. Breakfast is on us.Hilton

name: Esme Miami Beach
description: Esme Hotel has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Miami Beach. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The air-conditioned rooms come with a desk and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. All units have a wardrobe. Guests at Esme Hotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Esme Hotel include New World Center, Versace Mansion and LIK Fine Art Miami. The nearest airport is Miami Seaplane Base Airport, 3.1 mi from the hotel.

name: Atwell Suites Miami Brickell, An IHG Hotel
description: Nestled in the chic Brickell neighborhood near Port of Miami, Atwell Suites Miami Brickell offers an unparalleled experience, close to beautiful beaches and top attractions. Discover trendy rooftop restaurants and bars. Shop upscale boutiques in Brickell City Centre. Enjoy live music at Bayside Marketplace on Biscayne Bay and soak up the sun at Miami's iconic South Beach. Visit the Perez Art Museum, explore the vibrant culture of Little Havana, or catch an exciting Miami Marlins game at LoanDepot Park. Balance work and play in our spacious pet-friendly suites with free Wi-Fi and standing desks. Collaborate in our shared workspaces and bookable meeting room. Satiate anytime cravings at our 24/7 Market and Beverage Station and enjoy our paid bar with cocktails and shareable small plates. For an authentic taste of Miami, dine at Mosaico Kitchen & Bar located in our shared space with Hotel Indigo. From free breakfast to rooftop pool and fitness studio, indulge in the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Atwell Suites Miami Brickell, where your Miami adventure awaits!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Miami Beach
description: Find something delightfully different at AC Hotel Miami Beach, located on Collins Ave in the heart of sunny Miami Beach. Our hotel near Miami International Airport offers the perfect place to relax and soak up some Miami sunshine, with two beach chairs included in the hotel’s amenity fee. Explore the Miami Beach boardwalk within walking distance of our hotel, or wander through the boutique shops at nearby Lincoln Road Mall. Start your day with the European-inspired breakfast at our hotel restaurant, AC Kitchen, followed by Beach Yoga. At the end of the day, visit Gin & Collins for delicious tapas, signature cocktails and international wines. Our 24-hour fitness center helps you stay active with an assortment of free weights and cardio machines, while our rooftop pool boasts spectacular views of Miami Beach. Relax in your suite, featuring either floor-to-ceiling windows or a private balcony. You work hard, so play hard at AC Hotel Miami Beach.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami West/FL Turnpike
description: Make the most out of your Miami-Doral visit. Whether you're in town for a meeting, project, and or just a family vacation, we are the ideal choice. Centrally located 15 minutes from Miami International Airport and within 10 minutes to Dolphin Mall and soon to come American Dream Mall, this hotel is tailor-made for extended-stay travelers. All 123 suites have all the comforts of a home, and include fully equipped kitchens, in-room wireless WIFI, and incredible beds to ensure you get a great night's sleep. Don't leave your four-legged friends behind - this is a pet-friendly hotel! Start your day with a complimentary hot (and delicious) breakfast, or head to the fitness center for a revitalizing workout. If you'd like to explore the area, this hotel places you near all major expressways that can take you to the airport, Doral, Downtown Miami and the beautiful beaches. This home-away-from-home hotel in Doral Florida is just what you were looking for so you can experience a stress-free stay.Marriott

name: Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection
description: Surround yourself with world class shopping, decadent dining and electrifying entertainment venues at Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection. Our luxury hotel flaunts an ideal location along Miracle Mile near the area's most popular destinations including University of Miami, Watsco Center, Marlins Park as well as Little Havana. Boasting vaulted ceilings, a grand staircase and sparkling chandeliers, our spectacular hotel lobby sets the scene for our stylishly designed accommodations. Unpack in spacious rooms and suites with wood floors, sectional sofas, modern decor and deluxe amenities before relaxing on a canopy bed with plush, pillow-top mattresses and luxurious linens. In your free time, maintain your wellness routine at our hotel's fitness center, play a round of billiards in our game room or soak up the sunshine next to our gorgeous rooftop pool. From our boutique accommodations to intuitive amenities, Hotel Colonnade Coral Gables, Autograph Collection will entice your sense of enjoyment.Marriott

name: Aloft Coral Gables
address: 2524 South Le Jeune Road, Coral Gables, FL 33134
description: An easy breezy adventure awaits for you in South Florida at Aloft Coral Gables. Our downtown hotel is perfectly positioned to explore the boutique shops and fine-dining restaurants on the Miracle Mile, as well as take in the arts and entertainment of University of Miami in Coral Gables. Meet & mingle with friends at our W XYZ® bar, and grab healthy snacks and beverages from Re:fuel, our 24-hour pantry. Hang out in our ultra-modern lobby boasting a unique Spanish-inspired design, and discover our spacious rooms and suites with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi for posting pics and videos to your social media. You can also spend time on your room's balcony or patio, and sip cocktails and savor fresh seafood at our in-house restaurant. After a day exploring Coral Gables, make your way to our pool for a refreshing dip. Busy business travelers can reserve our 600-square-foot meeting room for events. Get ready to experience an urban-inspired oasis in the heart of Florida at Aloft Coral Gables.Marriott

name: Dream South Beach
description: Welcoming guests with pets, this hotel is located in Miami Beach and features an infinity pool and a private beach. It also provides a coffee bar, valet parking and a rooftop terrace. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a long day exploring the area, Shala Spa provides an ideal place to relax with massage services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and an iPod docking station. All provide an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in the area. Miami Beach's attractions, such as Ocean Drive and Miami Beach Architectural District, are easily accessible on foot from Dream South Beach. Located within a five-minute walk are the Wolfsonian-FIU and Lummus Park.Revato

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: Bentley Hotel South Beach
description: Location This hotel enjoys an oceanfront location in the heart of South Beach and the Art Deco district. It is within walking distance of South Beach's famous shopping streets and just 3 minutes from Lincoln Road Mall. Everything South Beach has to offer is at the doorstep: trendy restaurants, designer boutiques, non-stop nightlife and, of course, the beach. The accommodation is only 7 minutes from downtown Miami, 10 minutes from Brickell Avenue, 15 minutes from Coconut Grove and 20 minutes from Key Biscayne. Miami International Airport is 15 minutes away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 39 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby area, where a 24-hour check-out service is available. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Additional services include room service and a laundry. In addition, a conference room and a business centre are also available. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan, a kitchen and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a queen-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. For self-catering guests, there is a well equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Leisure options at the establishment also include a gym, a spa, a steam bath and massage treatments. A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Hampton Inn Miami/Dadeland
description: Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel is located off 70th Ave.-Dadeland in the prestigious shopping district of Dadeland. We are 10 miles south of Miami International Airport and 4 miles west of Tamiami Executive Airport. Dadeland/Miami, Florida area attractions include shopping malls, historical sites, Viscaya Museum, Fairchild Garden, Metro Zoo and the University of Miami. Within.5 mile you can dine at Benihana, Cheesecake Factory, Johnny rockets, or Mandarin Express. Our Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida features 5-stories with interior corridors in a Mediterranean style, 131 hotel rooms, heated hotel pool and whirlpool, meeting room that accommodates 25 people and state-of-the-art business center. Amenities you will find at our Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida include complimentary continental breakfast, in-room coffeemaker and TV with cable. We also offer connecting hotel rooms, cribs, hair dryers, irons, and refrigerators. Laundry/valet services, audio visual equipment, and meeting/banquet facilities are available at Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel of Florida for a nominal fee. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland hotel in Florida.Hilton

name: Extended Stay America Premier Suites - Miami - Airport - Doral - 87th Avenue South
description: Miami International Airport is 6.8 mi from this hotel in Florida. Kitchenette facilities are provided in all studios at this hotel. An on-site launderette is also available. Spacious studios are decorated in neutral colors with bright accents at the Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral - 87th Ave S. Each has a seating area, cable TV and is air conditioned. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. The Museum of the Americas is 2 mi from the hotel. Extended Stay America - Miami - Airport - Doral - 87th Ave S is 2 miles from Carlos Albizu University.

name: Edition Miami Beach
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: The Standard Spa Miami Beach
description: Featuring a full-service spa, this adult-only Miami Beach hotel also features rooms with a view of the lush gardens, Biscayne Bay, and outdoor infinity pool. Guests will be 12 minutes' walk to Lincoln Road Mall and 5 minutes' drive to South Beach. The spa amenities, which are complimentary to hotel guests, include a Turkish Hamam with heated marble, hemlock sauna, eucalyptus steam room, ice room, hot tub, cold plunge and gym are also on site. Massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, and full-body scrubs are offered as well at the Spa of The Standard Miami Beach, located in South Florida. The restaurant, Lido Bayside Grill, uses locally sourced ingredients and seasonal produce, with a global-inspired menu including expertly-grilled dishes, fried options, and chilled dishes. There is also an indoor healthy cafe restaurant and speakeasy-style bar and lounge. In addition to a bicycle hire and a private boat dock, guests can enjoy paddle boarding and kayaks. Miami International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West hotel is conveniently located near the Miami International Airport. This Hilton Garden Inn hotel is just minutes away from all area major corporations and attractions including the Miami Cruise Port, South Beach and the Art Deco District, Downtown Miami, and the Doral Business Park. Guest rooms have features designed with you in mind, including: Great American Grill serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening room service, 24-hour Pavilion Pantry convenience mart, Complimentary airport transportation, The Garden Sleep System bed, with non-allergenic feather pillows and duvet cover, In-room Cuisinart coffee maker, microwave, and mini-refrigerator, 32-inch high-definition, flat-screen TV with premium channels and Lodgenet movies, Complimentary high-speed wired and wireless Internet with remote printing provided by PrinterOn, in all guestrooms, Flexible workspace with Ergonomic Mirra Desk Chair, USA Today delivered Monday-Friday, Fitness center with cardio equipment, free weights and whirlpool, Outdoor heated pool. The hotel is a place for your events and meetings - Leave the details to the hotel event professionals: Dedicated sales team to focus on the details, Intimate function rooms with state-of-the-art technology, Business center with fax, print, and copying services. The hotel is close to corporations, government facilities, and local attractions, including: 1.5 miles from Cisco Systems, 1 mile from FedEx, 1.5 miles from General Electric, 3 miles from Oracle, 4 miles from 3M, 12 miles to Miami Beach, 9 miles to the Port of Miami. ***** Everything. Right where you need it. *****Hilton

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Miami Lakes
description: TownePlace Suites Miami Lakes Hotel offers all-suite extended stay accommodations. Our hotel is convenient to Opa Locka Airport (OPA) and Miami International Airport (MIA) near world-class restaurants, Premier shopping, Hard Rock Stadium, and several golf courses. Enjoy one of our many studio or two bedroom suites, all with fully-equipped kitchens, ample work space and comfortable bedding. Relax and enjoy the amenities that are ideal for short or extended-stays, including a complimentary hot breakfast daily, free high-speed Internet access, personalized voicemail, on-site business services and 24-hour staffing. A 24-hour guest laundry is also available at the hotel, Maintain your fitness routine in the hotel's exercise room or relax and unwind in the outdoor pool, or use the outdoor grill to fire up your meal. Your stay will be relaxing and productive at Towneplace Suites Miami Lakes, so sit back, relax and stay a while.Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell
description: Located within walking distance of the downtown Brickell Financial District, Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell is near a variety of restaurants, bars and nightlife. You’ll enjoy easy access to I-95 and the Miami International Airport from our extended stay hotel. Tour the nearby Vizcaya Museum & Gardens, a National Historic Landmark, or take your family for a fun day at the Miami Seaquarium located on Virginia Key and nearby Key Biscayne. Unwind in a spacious studio or one-bedroom suite. Our accommodations offer seating and sleeping areas, fully equipped kitchens, complimentary internet access and sofa beds. One-bedroom suites offer separate living areas and bedrooms, and a few rooms have partial views of Miami and the Bay. Join us each morning for a complimentary hot full breakfast, and enjoy dinner with drinks* after a busy day on Wednesday evenings. Stock up on snacks, beverages, meals and travel essentials at the 24-hour Suite Shop®. Relax on our second floor pool deck overlooking downtown Miami, and cool down with a swim in the covered outdoor swimming pool. Both the fitness gym and business center are open 24 hours. For business or social events, our downtown Miami/Brickell hotel accommodates up to 50 guests in a meeting room offering natural lighting. *Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.Hilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Sunny Isles Beach
address: 17700 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Soak up revitalizing sunshine, ocean breezes and stunning views at Residence Inn Miami Sunny Isles Beach, a hotel near Fort Lauderdale International Airport. Our extended-stay all suites hotel is directly across from the stunning white sands of Sunny Isles Beach and close to North Miami Beach’s fashion-forward shopping and entertainment. Our complimentary buffet breakfast energizes you for a fun-filled day in Sunny Isles Beach and free high-speed internet lets you search for fun things to do near the hotel. Cool off in our rooftop pool offering incredible views of the Miami Beach shoreline and blue skies before returning to your hotel suite. All pet-friendly suites at the hotel feature the amenities you need to cook a full meal, stretch out, sleep peacefully and work comfortably. Plus, with the proximity to Fort Lauderdale International Airport, our hotel near Oleta River State Park gives you easy access to both natural beauty and convenient travel options during your stay.Marriott

name: The Savoy Hotel & Beach Club
description: Each spacious suite at this hotel in Miami Beach offers Wi-Fi. This European-style hotel offers direct beach access and features 2 outdoor pools and private beach access. The suites at The Savoy Hotel include tea and coffee-making facilities. Each suite also provides a spacious seating area. Secluded in a 2-acre courtyard, the Hotel Savoy includes a restaurant that serves American cuisine indoors or outside on the patio. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Guests can relax on the raised sun decks that overlook the ocean at the hotel. Lummus Park is within a 5-minute walk from Savoy Hotel. Marjory Stoneman Douglas Ocean Beach Park is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Praia Hotel Hollywood
description: Well set in the center of Hollywood, PRAIA Hotel Hollywood provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free private parking. Featuring a garden, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 21 mi from Miami Beach and around 0.7 mi from Surfside Beach. The hotel features family rooms. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. All guest rooms include a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Bal Harbor Beach is 1.8 mi from PRAIA Hotel Hollywood, while New World Center is 5.4 mi away. The nearest airport is Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport, 7.5 mi from the accommodations.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Miami Airport East
address: 3501 N.W. Le Jeune Road, Miami, FL 33142
description: Just 20 minutes from Dolphin Stadium, the La Quinta Inn & Suites Miami Airport East is near all of your favorite attractions and only a mile from Miami International Airport (free shuttle service). We are just minutes from the Sports Complex (American Airlines Arena, Marlins Park, and Doral Golf & Resort). In less than 15 minutes, reach famed South Beach, Coconut Grove, beautiful Bayside, and the Miami Beach Convention Center. You will find plenty of great eateries within walking distance as well as shopping at Dolphin Mall and the Merchandise Mart. Great service begins mornings at the La Quinta Inn Miami Airport East, with a complimentary Free Bright Side BreakfastTM in the lobby. Free high-speed Internet access is included in all rooms.The computer center in the lobby has high-speed Internet access. We have a crystal-clear outdoor pool for your enjoyment. There is a guest laundry facility and plenty of parking, so book as many rooms as you want and stay as long as you like! Centrally located five miles west of downtown, we are convenient to Florida International University, the University of Miami, and the US Southern Command Center. Homestead Air Reserve Base is 25 miles away.Wyndham

name: Candlewood Suites Miami Exec Airport - Kendall
description: Welcome to the Candlewood Suites Hotel Miami Executive Airport - Kendall. You can enjoy the most modern and convenient extended stay hotel in Kendall. Business travelers and adventure seekers looking for the perfect home away from home, look no further for short term or extended stays in our hotel suites. Our hotel is right next to the Miami Executive Airport and just 20 miles away from Miami International Airport (MIA). With world class shopping centers including The Palms at Town & Country, Dolphin Mall and Dadeland Mall. Also conveniently located just minutes away from Miami Dade College, Baptist Hospital, Zoo Miami, Gold Coast Railroad Museum, Wings over Miami Museum, Kendall Ice Arena, Monkey Jungle, Black Point Marina, Homestead Miami Speedway, Everglades National Park, Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, and downtown Miami just a short drive away. Our spacious suites with fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary guest laundry, complimentary parking, 24-hour gazebo and barbecue area, outdoor pool, Fitness Center and signature amenities will make for a perfect stay. Stress free weekly housekeeping services will make for a more relaxing stay. Free high-speed Internet access, large work spaces with a desk chair, and recliner, give you all the comforts you need to stay relaxed.The hotel has a large-scale generator to operate all the areas of the hotel during power outages.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Cabana Miami Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: 2 beach chairs and towels: 2-hour bicycle rental: 20 minutes non-motorized water sports equipment rental: 10% off dinner at hotel restaurant: 2 refillable/recyclable aluminum water bottles. Situated in the heart of Miami Beach, Hilton Cabana Miami Beach is an upscale hotel set within 119 feet of oceanfront property. Located on Collins Avenue at 63rd Street, the hotel is just north of South Beach - in the center of south Florida’s best attractions and trendy neighborhoods. Close to Lincoln Road, Ocean Drive, Aventura Mall and Bal Harbour, the hotel is convenient to the Port of Miami, Miami Convention Center, restaurants, entertainment and nightlife. In cooler seasons, cozy up by the fire in our lobby and dine in our full-service restaurant, Deans List, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, as well as room service. On the top floor of the hotel, eight customizable meeting rooms with panoramic views of the Charles River are available for social events and meetings. Walk to Mass General Hospital, TD Garden, Boston Public Common, Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall Marketplace, and Bostons Italian North End. Logan International Airport is just 2.8 miles away.Wyndham

name: The Eliot Hotel
description: Built in 1925, the historic Eliot Hotel is located in Boston’s Back Bay neighborhood. It offers an on-site sashimi bar and elegantly decorated rooms with down comforters and marble bathrooms. Each room is equipped with soundproof windows, flat-screen TVs and WiFi internet. The Eliot’s guests can enjoy free access to the Boston Sports Club and on-site business center. Concierge desk staff can arrange dinner reservations or nightly turndown service. Babysitting and petsitting are also available. The restaurant Uni is located in the hotel and features a Japanese sushi bar and small plates. The Eliot is less than five minutes away from Hynes Convention Center. Nearby shopping includes the Prudential Shopping Center and Newbury Street shops. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox, is 2953 feet away.

name: Hotel Aka Back Bay
description: This historic Back Bay district hotel is located in the former headquarters of the Boston Police Department. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the hotel and an on-site grill is available. Copley Square and Boston Common are both less than 1640 feet away. The modern, decorative rooms of the Hotel AKA Back Bay feature a 46-inch flat-screen TV. Ironing facilities and a work desk are included. Guests can also enjoy Apothecary, a lobby lounge. An on-site fitness center and a business center are open at all times for guests. Hotel AKA Back Bay is 1.6 mi from Fenway Park. The Boston Back Bay train station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Indigo Boston Garden, An IHG Hotel
description: Nestled near North Station and TD Garden, and three miles from Logan Airport, Hotel Indigo Boston Garden offers comfort and convenience. Our renovated, pet-friendly, boutique hotel is steeped in history. Experience spacious rooms and a restaurant that blends hearty pub fare with New England charm. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, boardroom, and free Wi-Fi. The ideal hotel for attending Boston concerts, we’re also close to the financial center, JFK Building and GSA, healthcare facilities like Massachusetts General Hospital and Massachusetts Eye Ear, and universities like Harvard, Boston University, MIT, and Boston College. Follow the Freedom Trail and explore Faneuil Hall, Paul Revere's house, and Boston Harbor. Begin your Boston adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection
description: Where bold character and uncommon details meet, The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection is an original boutique hotel in Somerville, MA designed for the modern traveler. Combining historic charm with a modern twist, this once Ford Motor Assembly Plant offers travelers an escape from the predictable in vibrant Assembly Row – a center of shopping, dining and entertainment near Boston. At our hotel near the Boston Casino, unique perspectives and warm hospitality combine with heartfelt designs to create curated experiences, from our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor pool, to rooms and suites that offer a sense of place, with personal touches like pillow top mattresses, ergonomic workspaces and comfy bath robes. We have over 4,000 square-feet of distinguished event venues and access to The T, with transit service to downtown Boston, TD Garden, Fenway Park, and the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. From the warm welcome to tailored comforts, discover uncommon at our Assembly Row hotel!Marriott

name: Boston Harbor Hotel
description: Boston Harbor Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Boston City Center area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Boston Harbor Hotel. Flat screen television, carpeting, linens, mirror, towels can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, spa, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Boston (MA), Boston Harbor Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Studio Allston Hotel
description: Located in Boston, Studio Allston Hotel is a short drive from Harvard University and Boston Commons. It provides 3.5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This unique hotel offers an on-site fitness centre, meeting rooms and a playground. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Rooms at Studio Allston Hotel are comfortable and feature a refrigerator, a microwave and cable/satellite channels. They are all soundproofed and include a laptop safe, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at Studio Allston Hotel, there are a variety of restaurants located nearby. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
description: Our newly renovated all-suite hotel is conveniently located steps away from Fenway Park and is the closest extended-stay hotel to Boston University, Northeastern University, Colleges of the Fenway and the Longwood Medical Center. Enjoy our stunning views overlooking Fenway Park from the only Rooftop Bar in the Fenway neighborhood, making for an ideal starting point before and after a Red Sox game. We are also close to the House of Blues and the all-new MGM Music Hall – both great venues for catching a show! Explore the city of Boston and enjoy some fabulous shopping and dining at the world-famous Newbury Street or at the Prudential and Copley Malls – both just a 20-minute walk away. Stop by the Time Out Market Place and explore dining options from the top chefs in Boston. Alternatively, you can take a bike ride along the Charles River and enjoy the views. Plus, at our hotel near Back Bay Boston, we also have a great indoor swimming pool that is always a big hit for the entire family!Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Seaport District
description: We're near the waterfront, a five-minute walk from the Flynn Cruise Terminal. The BCEC, Rockland Trust Bank Pavilion, wharf dining, and several museums are within a mile. Join us for free breakfast, or prep favorites in your suite's full kitchen. An indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center await, and we have sunlit ballrooms and two outdoor terraces for events.Hilton

name: The Charles Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Harvard Square, this luxurious Cambridge hotel combines classic New England style with award-winning dining, elegant guestrooms and 24-hour personalized concierge services. Each of the rooms at The Charles Hotel in Harvard Square offers flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Guests can also enjoy free access to a nearby state-of-the-art fitness center as well as the on-site library and wireless internet access. While staying at the Charles, guests can take advantage of gourmet on-site dining options, such as the vibrant jazz club, the Regattabar. Classic New England cuisine is available at Henrietta's Table and rustic Italian dishes are featured at Benedetto. Popular area attractions, including the famed Harvard University are only moments from the Charles in Harvard Square. A number of charming cafes, shops and restaurants are also easily accessible. Boston city center is a short drive away with on-site car hire services.

name: Onyx Boston Downtown
description: Next to TD Garden in downtown Boston, our hotel is within walking distance of the city’s top attractions. Quincy Market, Haymarket, Boston City Hall, and the Old North Church are a half-mile walk away. We’re also close to transit stations, government offices, and dozens of restaurants.Hilton

name: Sheraton Commander Hotel
description: Timeless elegance is interwoven with modern conveniences at Sheraton Commander Hotel in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Our hotel near Harvard Square is located near boutiques and restaurants as well as prestigious academic institutions such as Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Harvard University and Tufts University. Paying homage to our colonial heritage, our hotel boasts a modern design with subtle, revolutionary-era flair. Amenities such as free high-speed Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs and plush bedding transform our hotel rooms into a quaint retreat amid the bustle of Harvard Square. Nubar, our on-site restaurant, serves classic New England cuisine with an innovative twist. If business brings you to Cambridge, our hotel in Cambridge, MA, features five elegant meeting venues, AV equipment and custom catering services, ideal for networking events and corporate conferences. From our paramount location to our thoughtful amenities, you can expect a legendary stay at Sheraton Commander Hotel.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
description: Located within steps of the Boston Common and the Public Garden, this Four Seasons has rooms with views of Boston. The hotel has facilities like an indoor pool, fitness center and spa. A flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at the Boston Four Seasons. There are also free toiletries, slippers and a bathrobe in the private bathroom. On-site dining at the Bistro Lounge offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Boston Opera House is 2297 feet from the hotel. The train at Arlington Station is 656 feet away.

name: Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston
description: Featuring a bar, Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston is located in the center of Boston, a 4-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Back Bay, Boston Museum of Fine Arts and Fenway Park. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 5.6 miles from Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston.

name: Cambria Hotel Boston Somerville
description: Enjoy an upscale stay in the heart of one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Boston. Between Union and Porter Squares, the Cambria Hotel Boston Somerville in Somerville is just over a half mile from Harvard University and near Tufts University and MIT. Join us for dinner at Josephine which is is a celebration of family and food thats focused on pizza, Italian favorites and the simple pleasure of dining together. The hotel is also across the street from Somernova, a business park and innovation incubator. Walk to restaurants, cocktail lounges and breweries. Modern guestrooms offer plush bedding and spa inspired bathrooms with oversize showers and Bluetooth mirrors. Each room also features free WiFi and a flatscreen TV, as well as conveniences like a desk space, a refrigerator and a coffee maker.Choice Hotels

name: InterContinental Boston
description: Historic elegance meets modern luxury at the InterContinental Boston. Our waterfront hotel, located on the Boston Harbor, is one of the city's most celebrated hotels in a truly iconic location. Our beautifully redesigned rooms showcase the Boston cityscape with floor to ceiling windows. Whether hosting an event or relaxing in our Spa InterContinental, you will appreciate the close proximity to Boston’s most sought-after landmarks, like the Boston Tea Party & Ships Museum.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Verb Hotel
description: Situated within walking distance of St. Marys Street MBTA Subway Station, The Verb Hotel provides guests with a convenient base while visiting Boston. It has a gym, as well as an outdoor pool, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. This modern hotel provides a number of facilities, such as luggage storage, a concierge and a car rental desk. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. The air conditioned rooms at The Verb Hotel are well-appointed. They feature blackout curtains, a refrigerator and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include Hojoko, which provides an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Boston's attractions, including Kenmore Square and Back Bay Fens, are within easy walking distance of The Verb Hotel. It is also within walking distance of Berklee College of Music, the Museum of Fine Arts and Northeastern University.Revato

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Boston Somerville
description: Your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville is HERE FOR YOU! Whether you are here for business or to take in the sights and sounds of the birthplace of American liberty, you can be assured your stay with us will be comfortable and enjoyable. Conveniently located off of I-93 and only two miles from downtown Boston, our hotel is located in the trendy Assembly Row area of Somerville. Boston's rich and colorful history is at your fingertips with convenient access to the MBTA (commonly referred to as the "T") located within walking distance of the hotel. Our complimentary shuttle service is available to transport you to and from Logan International Airport (contact hotel to schedule). Whether your adventure brings you to Boston, Somerville or Cambridge, you are guaranteed to be at the center of it all! Boston boasts a winning sports tradition with the Boston Red Sox at Fenway Park (5 mi) along with the Bruins and Celtics at TD Bank Garden (2 mi). If sightseeing is your game, Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market is only a short "T" ride away. Within walking distance from the hotel, Assembly Row boasts a unique shopping, dining, and entertainment experience including SAKS 5th Avenue OFF FIFTH, Earl's Restaurant, AMC IMAX Theatre and LEGOLAND Discovery Center.Boston is known for higher education with Harvard, MIT and Tufts among the many major colleges and universities in the area. Business is a necessity, and be assured our location guarantees you can get the job done! The Boston and Hynes Convention Centers, Financial District, Cabot and Schrafts Office Parks and Mass General Hospital are easily accessible from our hotel. At your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville you will find friendly service, comfortable accommodations, and exceptional value. Our 147 spacious rooms and suites equipped with comfy pillow-top mattresses will provide a relaxing night's sleep. Wake up refreshed and energized with our Free Bright Side Breakfast including hot waffles, coffee, juice, breads, muffins, cereal, and fresh fruit. Unwind with a workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center, enjoy free Wi-Fi, and take advantage of our onsite business center. Parking is included in your stay or leave the driving to us with our free shuttle to Boston Logan International Airport, the T, and Mass General Hospital (contact hotel to schedule). All rooms include a refrigerator, HD TV with complimentary Showtime, coffee maker, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, and free high-speed Wi-Fi.Whether it is work or leisure that brings you to the area, your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville is READY FOR YOU! Let our warm hospitality, friendly staff and outstanding accommodations be the beginning to your Boston adventure!Free parking available to overnight guests only. Stay and Go packages are available that include extended parking for up to 7 days.Wyndham

name: Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston
description: Located in Boston, a 8-minute walk from Boston Common and 700 yards from the center, Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston has air-conditioned accommodations with free Wifi, and a shared lounge. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There's a private bathroom with walk-in shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The apartment offers a business center for guest use. Popular points of interest near Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston include Boston South Station, Boston Public Garden and Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 4.3 miles from the accommodation.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Boston
description: With an enviable location opposite Boston Common, The Ritz-Carlton, Boston provides contemporary urban luxury in downtown Boston, MA. Our 193 hotel rooms and suites feature expansive views and sleek styling, and fully updated meeting spaces offer a welcoming atmosphere for conferences and social events. Additional hotel features include the Avery Bar, with its signature martinis and mid-century glamour, and the adjoining Equinox Sports Club. Explore all that our luxury hotel in downtown Boston has to offer.Marriott

name: Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston
description: The Best of Boston in Quincy! Take advantage of great services and amenities at this Boston area hotel at affordable rates guaranteed! Conveniently located just five miles south of Boston on Interstate 93, The Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston is the ideal setting for business, social events, or vacations. Accommodations are provided for both business and leisure guests at a great value. Close to the Boston convention and exhibition centers and the Quincy historical and business districts near State Street Corporation, Blue Cross/Blue Shield of MA and Boston Scientific-yet peacefully located on the Neponset River. Guests who stay at the Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston have the advantage of taking care of business and unwinding all in the same place! After a tough day on the road relax at our Adams Pub and enjoy delicious New England fare in our cozy and comfortable atmosphere. All 105 guest rooms are equipped with free high-speed wireless internet and provide plenty of space for your needs. The Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston is less than five miles to the Boston Seaport World Trade Center, Bayside Expo Center and the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center. Local attractions such as the John F. Kennedy Library, Adam's Historical National Park, Fenway Park (Home of the Red Sox), New England Aquarium and Quincy market are minutes away. Business and Social Groups will enjoy our outstanding meeting and conference facilities, including our Constitution Pavilion and our unique waterfront landing and gazebo where your group can enjoy an authentic New England fare. You must be 21 years of age to book a room at our hotel.bestwestern.com

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Boston Cleveland Circle
description: Connect to the city in a new way at AC Boston Hotel Cleveland Circle, located at the crossroads of academia and athletics, history and entertainment, Boston and Brookline. Infused with European style, Spanish flair, and Boston soul, our boutique hotel offers innovative spaces, tailored to the needs of creative, well-traveled, entrepreneurial spirits, including a daily European-style breakfast and free WiFi throughout the hotel, 50-inch Smart TVs, comfortable pillow-top mattresses and ergonomic inroom workspaces. A convenient business center, flexible event venues, and a 24-hour fitness center allow you to work and meet where you choose. Every evening, unwind at the AC Lounge, where our bartenders serve handcrafted cocktails to pair with specialty tapas. Our hotel is also ideally located near Boston University, Fenway Park, Agganis Arena, Reservoir and Cleveland Circle Stations, MBTA Green Line, for further Boston adventures. Welcome to an elevated state of mind.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf
description: Boston's rich history is right outside your door when you stay at the Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf. Our all-suite hotel near downtown Boston is conveniently located and within walking distance of the historic North End, Boston Harbor and TD Garden. Our waterfront Boston hotel offers a choice of studio, one- or two-bedroom suites, all with amazing Boston Harbor views and beautiful interior decor. Unique amongst Boston extended stay hotels, our hotel offers a stylish retreat at a substantial value; free Wi-Fi access, a complimentary daily hot breakfast buffet, a heated indoor pool and an evening mix Monday through Wednesday. All our beautiful suites come equipped with full kitchens, refrigerators, cooktops, separate living and dining areas, and ample space to relax or entertain. Escape from typical Boston hotels and discover the distinctive style of the Residence Inn, a Marriott extended stay Harbor view hotel in Boston.Marriott

name: Hilton Boston Park Plaza
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium guest internet access; daily $15 food and beverage credit (excludes room service); daily $15 dry cleaning credit; Lynx Fitness Club access; Press Reader access. We’re located in downtown Boston, surrounded by shopping, dining and entertainment. The Public Garden and Boston Common are steps away from us, while Beacon Hill and the Theater District are within a half-mile. As one of Boston’s most historic hotels, we are conscious about our community’s wellbeing and committed to uplifting the people and places that make our city thrive.Hilton

name: Fairmont Copley Plaza Boston
description: Fairmont Copley Plaza is a luxury downtown Boston landmark hotel that has been a symbol of the city's rich history and elegance since its gala opening in 1912. Centrally located the hotel is just steps away from area attractions, restaurants and shops. Savor fine seasonal cuisine and signature craft cocktails at our award-winning American brasserie, OAK Long Bar + Kitchen, host an event for 1,100 in the Grand Ballroom or be inspired by city panoramas in the rooftop fitness center.accorhotels.com

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Boston Downtown
description: Connect to the city in a new way at AC Hotel Boston Downtown, a hotel in Boston, MA located at the intersection of past and present, revolution and academia, rich culture and sports-fueled pride. Thoughtful service & modern mindset define our hotel near Tufts Medical Center where every element is tailored for harmony in your Boston travels. Our amenities include European-inspired breakfast at an additional cost, free WiFi, 50-inch TVs, flexible workspace and mini-fridges. We also offer a 24-hour fitness center, business services, and meeting spaces for 5 to 80 guests. Find a great selection of quick snacks in the AC Store or join us in the AC Lounge for a nightly selection of tapas-inspired bites. Since we cater to travelers looking to immerse themselves in the energy of downtown, know that from our South End Boston hotel you’re minutes to the heart of the city – to attractions, theater, universities & convention centers, as well as the airport. Welcome to an elevated state of mind.Marriott

name: The Whitney Hotel Boston
description: The Whitney Hotel, a new 65-room luxury hotel, will offer guests generous hospitality through sophisticated simplicity and cultured comforts. Named after Henry Melville Whitney, a prominent Boston industrialist and one-time owner of the hotel site, the property is a haven apart from the urban hustle, welcoming guests with uncomplicated, urbane luxury, complemented by the comforts and indulgences of home. With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Lenox
description: Centered in Boston's historic Back Bay area, this boutique hotel features a state-of-the-art gym, award-winning dining and elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi. John Hancock Tower is 5 minutes’ walk away. Each room boasts panoramic views of the Back Bay neighborhood. Flat-screen TVs, a small fridge and plush terry bathrobes are provided. The luxury rooms offer mahogany furniture and crystal lamps. Hotel Lenox offers personalized concierge services and a 24-hour business center. Guests can enjoy Irish food at Sólás, an authentic Boston Irish pub. City-Table restaurant serves contemporary American cuisine made from fresh ingredients. Room service is available 24 hours. The Lenox is 3 blocks from famous restaurants and shops on Newbury Street. Fenway Park baseball stadium is just 1 mile from the hotel and Northeastern University is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge
description: Located 2 miles from Harvard Square, this Cambridge, MA hotel features on-site dining. Boston city center is 3 miles away. A flat-screen cable TV, iPod dock, coffee maker, and free toiletries are included in the rooms at the Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge, Overlooking Boston. The rooms also include a sofa and desk. This Hyatt Regency features concierge service and 24-hour front desk assistance. The hotel also has on-site fitness and and offers dining options from Paperback Tavern & Provisions to Paperback Provisions. Massachusetts Institute of Technology is less than a mile from the hotel. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox baseball team, is 1.8 miles away.
